title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: The 'Open Project' and 'Close Project' options are not always available in the Navigator view.
EB: Either both 'Open Project' and 'Close Project' options should be available, or neither of them should be enabled.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the Navigator view.
2. Select both P1 and P2 projects.
3. Observe that the 'Open Project' and 'Close Project' options are not always available.
